data.prayer: Spirit, inspire Bible translators to communicate the Scriptures accurately in the heart languages spoken in Coronie, Suriname.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Coronie, Suriname
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 497 believers in Coronie to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 497 believers in the state of Coronie.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Coronie an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Saramaccan people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Coronie who will make disciples who make disciples.
Spirit, help every believer in Coronie, Suriname be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Coronie to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

location.name: Coronie
location.people_groups_list: Sikiana, Surinamese, Dutch-speaking, Arab, Syrian, Han Chinese, Cantonese, Indonesian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sikiana (30), Surinamese, Dutch-speaking (1,500), Arab, Syrian (1,200), Han Chinese, Cantonese (6,800), Indonesian (19,000)
